scripts.prebuild: npm run build:main && npm run build:preload && esbuild src/main/parsers.ts src/utils/settings.ts --outdir=src --out-extension:.js=.cjs --format=cjs --platform=node
scripts.start: npm run prebuild && npm run build:renderer && electron .
scripts.dev: npm run prebuild && concurrently -k -s first -n "VITE,ELECTRON" -c "cyan,magenta" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development vite --open=false" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron ."
scripts.build:portable: npm run prebuild && npm run build:renderer && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --win portable
scripts.build:portable:x64: npm run prebuild && npm run build:renderer && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --win portable --x64
scripts.build:zip:x64: npm run prebuild && npm run build:renderer && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --win zip --x64
scripts.build:exe:x64: npm run prebuild && npm run build:renderer && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.build:mac:dmg: npm run prebuild && npm run build:renderer && cross-env ELECTRON_BUILDER_DISABLE_PUBLISH=true CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --mac dmg --publish never
scripts.build:mac:zip: npm run prebuild && npm run build:renderer && cross-env ELECTRON_BUILDER_DISABLE_PUBLISH=true CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --mac zip --publish never
scripts.build:mac:all: npm run prebuild && npm run build:renderer && cross-env ELECTRON_BUILDER_DISABLE_PUBLISH=true CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --mac dmg --x64 --arm64 --publish never
